title: DMG Blockchain Solutions Announces Preliminary December Mining Results and Year in Review

title: BitFuFu Announces December 2024 Production and Mining Operations Update
description: SINGAPORE, Jan. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — BitFuFu Inc., (“BitFuFu” or “the Company”) (NASDAQ: FUFU), a global leader in Bitcoin mining and comprehensive mining services, today announced its unaudited production and mining operations updates for December 2024. Key Highlights: Bitcoin Production: Produced 111 Bitcoins (“BTC”) from self-mining operations, representing a 32% increase from November 2024. Bitcoin […]
